name: Dream-A-Geddon
description:
Did you ever had a nightmare? Yeah, me neither. Did you at any point have a nightmare? No doubt! nor I. Investigate the darkest side of your imagination and kill every one of the beasts that ran over your dread

this game is based on an kid who stucked in a zombie apocalypse and make attempts to get by Discover what occurred straightaway!!!

How dare them disturb your slumber? Prepare your weapons. Let's show these nightmare creatures who's boss.

I just noticed a bug with the tenth wave (normally you should see a win screen, but yeah thats the bug) After beating wave 10 you're officialy a winner! :D
